task.title: Export your app using an ad hoc or development provisioning profile

taskbody.context: When you export the app, Xcode re-signs the app using the code signing assets that you choose. To learn more about the distribution method, you can refer to this Apple document: Distribution method.

step.cmd: To open the Archives organizer, choose Window > Organizer and click Archives.

Select the archive you want to export, then click Distribute App and follow the instructions to get the .ipa file. Here, we choose a development provisioning profile to export the Coffee Timer.ipa file.
